title: Same Denominators
text: Make sure the fractions have the same denominator before adding them.
speech: Make sure the fractions have the same denominator before adding them.
pacedSpeech: Make sure the fractions have the same denominator before adding them.

title: Divide Rational Expressions
text: Since the denominators are the same, put both of the numerators of the rational expression over a single denominator.
speech: Since the denominators are the same, put both of the numerators of the rational expression over a single denominator.
pacedSpeech: Since the denominators are the same, put both of the numerators of the rational expression over a single denominator.

title: Finding Numerators
text: Think about what the numerators are.

title: Simplify
speech: Can  fraction, 2 w squared, plus 8 w, over, 3 w squared, minus 16,   be simplified further?

title: Factoring
text: Try factoring the numerator and denominator.

title: Difference of Squares
text: Notice that the denominator has a difference of squares.
